X.i.4.C.2.g
.
When Recertifications of Service Are Not Required
Recertifications of service are
not
required for cases involving members of the Navy or Regular Philippine Scouts.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
